alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Jasper; Lawrence; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:03AM CDT until June 17 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT FOR LAWRENCE...SOUTHERN CRAWFORD...SOUTHEASTERN JASPER AND RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 702 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chauncey to Parkersburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 655 AM, a 58 mph wind gust was reported at the Olney Noble airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chauncey, Hardinville, New Hebron, Lawrenceville, Flat Rock, Birds, St. Francisville, Russellville and Vincennes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.
